name: BLISTURD
description: “Blisturd” is a name given to a newly discovered parasite that exists inside fecal matter, where it lay dormant for eternity, or until ingested. Often, when travelers are hungry and desperate, they mistake feces for struedal because of its attractive, flaky surface. Most races’ saliva immediately activates the parasite upon ingestion, and almost immediately a “Blisturd” is born within the body.   Created By Alex Pardee @alexpardee
